title: Vampires adversaries series Box Set
description: 2 books in the Vampires adversaries series.BOOK 1VAMPIRES ADVERSARIESSynopsisLast full moon of the year, the Vangoth Family will have to choose a representative to the Vampires’s Council.Apollo makes a pact with Enna, to get the chair, and in return he promises the young woman she’ll conquer the love of his adversary, the vampire Deron ...BOOK 2ANDROMEDAVAMPIRES ADVERSARIESSynopsisSeven years later ...Enna and Apollo are released from their punishments. Deron returns the Vangoth family’s home due to mysterious illness of his uncle Vilk.On the council of vampires, who will be the emissary of the Vangoth family...Apollo or Deron?
author: Pet Torres
